mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_NM AS userNm, PROFILE_NM AS profileNm, BIRTHDAY AS birthday, GENDER AS gender, ZIPCODE AS zipcode, ADDR AS addr, DETAIL_ADDR AS detailAddr FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PROFILE_NM = #{profileNm}, ZIPCODE = #{zipcode}, ADDR = #{addr}, DETAIL_ADDR = #{detailAddr} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
